QuestData.Title: Training and Discipline
QuestData.Description: I told myself that, if I ever made it here to the Hidden Master, I would learn everything I could from him. This is my chance, $n. I'm not going to let it slip away.$b$bStill, I fear that Stoneplow needs us. I left early, before we were able to push the mantid scouts back. I'd feel better if you would check in with the Watch Commander for me.$b$bOh, and if you run into the others, maybe you should tell them where the Hidden Master is...
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Loon Mai at Stoneplow in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm glad to hear that Lin is well.$b$bOur defenses are holding, for now. The mantid continue to send their scouts over the wall, but they haven't gotten much farther than that.
